abstract: Sir Paul McCartney married Nancy Shevell in a small civil ceremony on Sunday at Marylebone Town Hall in London.
snippet: Sir Paul McCartney married Nancy Shevell in a small civil ceremony on Sunday at Marylebone Town Hall in London.
lead_paragraph: Beatles fans now have two reasons to toast to their favorite band each Oct. 9: On what would have been John Lennon's 71st birthday, Sir Paul McCartney married Nancy Shevell in a small civil ceremony on Sunday at Marylebone Town Hall in London, The Associated Press reported.
